inner col col12 first last id338ebf49-d589-4629-be28-6780d5a62304

h4.a: Governor Baker extends school buildings closure; At-Home Learning to continue

li.div: Governor Baker announced an extension of mandatory closure of school buildings to the end of the school year. DESE will recommend updated learning standards, many of which the district already began implementing in phase 2 of our At-Home Learning plan. Read On...

h4.a: At-Home Learning Plan for APS Families

li.div: We continue our work to support APS students during the district's closure, and are providing the APS At-Home Learning plan for students. This new phase begins on April 6, 2020. Read On...

h4.a: New Guidance on Video Conferencing for At-Home Learning

li.div: As the district launched the phase 2 of our At-Home learning plan, families were sent a communication regarding video permissions and use of technology tools. The original form that you may have signed stated that these live sessions would be recorded. Read On...
